Description: Large wall sherd from a pottery storage-jar decorated on the exterior with an incised figure of a man riding a camel. The exterior of the pot is a buff colour which has been blackened over much of the surface.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), House 849 Room 1 Floor 1 deposit
Type series: Adams Ware U10; form Y7; style X
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
